Dialogues.Text: Why, hello there! I don't think you're helping me out today. Is there something I can do for ya?

Responses.Title: I'd like to ask you something.

Dialogues.Text: Well you came to the right place! What can I get for ya?
Well that's just perfect! I happen to have some leftovers; here you go. Enjoy!
Oh? Well, I'll see if i can help... Shoot.

Responses.Title: How'd you learn to cook so well?
What do you think of the Seamstress?

Dialogues.Text: Is there anything else you'd like to ask?

Responses.Title: How'd you learn to cook so well?
What do you think of the Seamstress?

Dialogues.Text: Hah! I guess its only natural to be interested in how one makes such fine cuisines. Before settling down here, I actually was quite well travelled! I've journeyed across the world, and picked up cooking techniques from a wide variety of cultures. I'm glad I'm able to carry on these techniques, even after the fall of some of those civilizations...

Oh... I uh... I'm not sure I should be talking about such things without good reason. He's not the type you should go talking about behind his back. All I'll say is that I met him along my travels quite a while ago, and he's put my talents to good use. Cooking for you all is quite a fulfilling job!

She's a good friend! It might come as a shock, but behind her... abrasive persona, she's actually quite sweet. I mean, where do you think my apron and hat came from? [c/FFFF00:Send her my regards when next you see her!] Oh, though she can be especially, er... distrusting, of newcomers; be warned. I promise she's a lot nicer once you get to know her though!
